column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2 of a man of 37 years old, with sagittal section n°69 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. We see clearly: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 715.8691 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4606.3477 mm³ and the left cerebellar cortex of volume 47.4609 mm³.
